org.apache.hive.hcatalog.streaming

Class AbstractRecordWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hive.hcatalog.streaming.AbstractRecordWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordWriter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelimitedInputWriter, StrictJsonWriter, StrictRegexWriter
    Deprecated. 
    as of Hive 3.0.0, replaced by AbstractRecordWriter

    @Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractRecordWriter
extends Object
implements RecordWriter
